typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	Campo as string,
	Fecha as string
}
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> LecturaADL
LecturaADL filter(toTimestamp(byName($Campo))>= toTimestamp($Fecha)) ~> Campo
Campo sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	recreate:true,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
